title: Ik wil graag weer E mail kunnen ontvangen en versturen
content: Ik heb geen vraag, maar vindt het allemaal erg ingewikkeld. Ik ben 81 jaar. Ik wil weer e mail ontvangen en versturen. Met vriendelijke groet, D.Mik
creator: geda2006

title: Two gmail accounts, same settings, can only get IMAP mail from one
content:
I use 2 different gmail accounts for different purposes. I get mail for AccountA via IMAP on Thunderbird, no problem, and have for years. For over a year now I've been unable to collect mail for my second-string address, AccountB, on Thunderbird, and have had to get it in the browser.

I've finally decided to do something about this. I removed AccountB from Thunderbird & set it up again. I'm using the exact same settings (in Thunderbird and in Gmail) that I do for AccountA, the only difference is the password. I've double-checked the password, too. But when I try to connect, I get a pop-up:

titled: Enter credentials for AccountB@gmail.com on imap.gmail.com [a very long URL which I've copied & saved] page from Google:

400. That's an error. The server cannot process the request because it is malformed. It should not be retried. That's all we know.

Thanks a heap, guys!

Is this problem coming from Thunderbird, or from Google? What do I do now?

Thanks,

MEC
creator: curtin.me

title: in my message filtering, how do I specify that an email address exists in my address book
content:
I've set up filters to eliminate all the spam I get, using a White list and a Black list. While that mostly worked, I wanted a better idea. So I got rid of the blacklist, and just have a White list. If any email address isn't in the White list, I want the email to be automatically transferred to the Junk emal folder.

The concept seems to work, except that I want to also accept all email in my address book when it falls thru the whitelist filter, but I don't know how to specify this. Is it possible?
creator: Don-Peters

title: file recovery after crash
content:
My PC's hard drive crashed and took TBird's data files with it.

However, I created an email backup on an external drive two days earlier. It consists of two folders full of files .

They are: maocg35b.default tcv0srue.default-release

I downloaded Thunderbird from this site and installed it. If someone reading this is absolutely certain how to get the new installation to incorporate these data files, please respond with directions.

title: My PC was crushed, how to connect with new PC?
content:
Hello, My PC was crushed suddenly. I cannot the PC on again. Then I installed the Thunderbird to another PC and succussed, but I cannot catch the e-mail. Message on the inbox, no mail is found.

How can I connect again with new PC? Please tell me.

Sincerely

title: Donation
content:
I thought Thunderbird was free to use. It's asking me to donate and I can't access my current emails from my account. If this is free than why on earth do I HAVE to donate to get access to my emails. That is not right. Please help me.

Thank you Malcolm

title: Adam Wrzesiński

title: Folder Creation
content:
Hi,

My company and I use your service and I'm doing an investigation by trying to track who created a sub-folder and when. I was wondering if someone could assist me with that or if you could potentially send me a step-by-step guide on how to do so myself?

Your assistance in this regard would be appreciated.

Thanks.

Marlon.
creator: cindysswimschool

title: Geen inhoud meer in verstuurde mails
content:
Sinds kort gebruik ik Thunderbird. Erg blij mee. Maar ik heb iets vreemds. Af en toe wil ik een mail teruglezen die ik eerder verzonden heb. Die staat in de map Verzonden berichten. En als er een bijlage in die verzonden mail zit, dan is de rest van de inhoud verdwenen. Alleen de bijlage staat er nog in.

Is er iemand die dit herkent? En weet hoe dit op te lossen? Ik draai Thunderbird op een Macbook Air met de laatste systeem software en de laatste versie van Thunderbird.

Dank voor het meedenken!

Groetjes, Hans
creator: hans176

title: nieuwe account
content: ik wil een acccount toevoegen. Dat lukt goed, configuraite wordt gevonden. Maar 1. bij IMAP krijg ik bericht dat de configuratie niet kan worden geverifieerd; 2. idem bij POP3; 3. bij Exchange kreeg ik eerst een bericht dat het gelukt was, maar ik kreeg geen enkele mail binnen in mijn IN postvak. Heb de account verwijderd en opnieuw willen toevoegen, zelfde procedure, zelfde problemen, en nu de boodschap 'Inkomende server bestaat al'. Wat doe ik mis? Thanks Jean
creator: jbourgeois679

title: Cardbook - NextCloud 29 :   contacts with birthday = forbidden
content:
Hello,

I have just migrated to NC 29 (.0.8). Since then, it’s impossible to synchronize a contact if a birthday exists. By deleting the birthday, you can synchronize the contact. I’m using cardbook (97.5) - thunderbird(128.4.3esr - 64 bits), on linux.

What should I do?

Thank you for your suggestions.

Best regards,

Christian

NC 29.0.8 shared hosting : ovhcloud php : 8.2 Base : 10.5.27-MariaDB-deb11-log
creator: christian.hinque

title: Problemi vari: aiuto!
content:
Ciao a tutti. Non so cosa sia successo in passato (forse qualche versione beta ha incasinato tutto), ma da un bel po' Thunderbird presenta vari problemi: - impossibile cancellare uno o più account e relativi messaggi - impossibile modificare le impostazioni: tornano sempre a quelle di default - ricezione del messaggi lenta: dopo aver chiesto di scaricarli passano 5/7 minuti prima di vederne uno - continuo messaggio di errore (crash) una volta chiuso il programma

In sostanza non ne posso più, ma ho circa 10 anni di email di lavoro gestiti da Thunderbird e non vorrei cambiare. Ho installato Thunderbird su un altro computer e funziona alla perfezione, ma quando gli dico di usare il vecchio profilo (copiato e incollato sul nuovo PC) tutto smette di funzionare.

In sintesi: vorrei migrare tutti i messaggi e relative cartelle su un nuovo profilo senza tenere le impostazioni del vecchio profilo.

Qualcuno mi può aiutare? Grazie
creator: cronosdata

title: How to Open 'Sent' Folder by Default Thunderbird
content: I would like to open the 'sent' page on my outlook email by default because it is set to inbox right now. I would like the option to change what folder it is set to. Thank you.
creator: better.you665

title: How does one transfer addressbook entries from an old computer to a new one?
content:
How does one transfer address book entries from an old computer to a new one? On November 9, David from TB suggested that I go to abook.sqlite and then import to the new computer with tools>import>import from a file. I may not have understood David's instructions as all I get when I do this is correspondence between others who have had the same problem and TB support. I have tried everything, but have no computer compatibility. I suppose I need information on how 1) to place the old address book into a file on the old computer, and then, 2) to transfer that file to TB on the new computer without previous correspondence between TB users and support.

P.S. I have Windows 10 and 64 gb.
creator: Jamesrsamec41
